Name: Small Town Detective
About the game: You love mystery, puzzles and the whodunit trope in movies? This is the game for you! Small Town Detective is a single-player game where you are the new detective in town that has a killer on the loose. Every night there is a new victim until the killer is arrested. Your job is to question the citizens, collect and examine the clues they give you, and find the killer. The catch is they are not all sincere nor cooperative. Will you manage to find the killer before they kill all the citizens? Come play the game and find out! Features Single-player mode Random Generated mode Weekly challenges Atmospheric graphics Good for the brain
